Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Satanin 1 (cecropin, UCSS1a; natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (82.05%) toOxysterlin 3K: 21%, V: 13%, I=R: 11%. GRAVY: -0.476; mol wt: 4349.259; mol formula: C198H345N60O49; mol ex coeff: 5550.Activity: active against Gram- E. coli ATCC 25922 or ATCC 35218 (MIC 3.12 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa ATCC 105663 (MIC 6.25 ug/ml), K. pneumoniae ATCC BAA 170513 (MIC 3.12 ug/ml), Gram+ S. aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC 50 ug/ml), E. faecalis ATCC 29212  (MIC 25 ug/ml), fungi C. parapsilosis ATCC 22019 (MIC 50 ug/ml).
Literature Information.Author: Henao Arias DC, Toro LJ, Téllez Ramirez GA, Osorio-Méndez JF, Rodríguez-Carlos A, Valle J, Marín-Luevano SP, Rivas-Santiago B, Andreu D, Castaño Osorio JC. 2021
Literature Information.Title: Novel antimicrobial cecropins derived from O. curvicornis and D. satanas dung beetles.
